content:
published  December  

Freshman linebacker Bradley Vance and freshman running back Marion Barber III were both named to The Sporting News Freshman AllAmerica teams this week PERIOD Vance made the first team while Barber was a third team choice PERIOD

Hornby tops in Canada

Minnesota rower Beth Hornby was named  Rowing Canada Aviron Sculler of the Year PERIOD Hornby won the gold in the under23 lightweight womens double and a bronze in the lightweight womens pair at the Canada Cup PERIOD

Mankad ranked second

Minnesotas mens tennis player Harsh Mankad is ranked second in the nation in the latest ITA Tennis Rankings PERIOD

Mankad finished the fall season  and won the National Intercollegiate Indoor Championships PERIOD He is the highest ranked player in school history PERIOD
